name: discord-soundboard
title: Discord Soundboard
description: Access and play Discord soundboard sounds directly from Raycast.
author: lachero

commands.name: open-soundboard
commands.title: Open Soundboard
commands.subtitle: Discord
commands.description: Browse and play sounds from your Discord Soundboard

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
